channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Gutentor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Gutentor

item.title: CVE-2024-5417|2024-08-29T14:03:28.662Z -- unknown -- gutentor
item.description: The Gutentor WordPress plugin before 3.3.6 does not validate and escape some of its block options before outputting them back in a page/post where the block is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks

item.title: CVE-2024-5417|2024-08-29T06:00:02.726Z -- unknown -- gutentor
item.description: The Gutentor WordPress plugin before 3.3.6 does not validate and escape some of its block options before outputting them back in a page/post where the block is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks
